word_mean_info__list.difference: 指贪婪地读，暗含对某些作者或作品迷恋之义。
最普通用词，含义广泛。既指朗读又可指默读。
指快速扫视文章等以抓住其要旨。

bilingual.target: 我们在那里阅读和借书。

bilingual.source: She could read by herself at the age of four.
bilingual.target: 她在四岁时就能自己阅读。

bilingual.source: We can read about important historical events.
bilingual.target: 我们可以阅读重要的历史事件。

bilingual.source: I read the updated posts from other forum members.
bilingual.target: 我阅读其他论坛成员的更新帖子。

bilingual.source: The students read many great works in Chinese classes.
bilingual.target: 学生们在语文课上阅读了许多名著。

bilingual.source: While I'm eating breakfast, I often read news articles online.
bilingual.target: 吃早餐时，我经常在网上阅读新闻文章。

bilingual.source: I started to learn to read and write Kazakh and Russian.
bilingual.target: 我开始学习阅读和书写哈萨克语和俄语。

bilingual.source: This year, I'm going to learn to read and write Kiswahili.
bilingual.target: 今年，我将学习阅读和书写斯瓦希里语。

bilingual.source: She volunteers there once a week to help kids learn to read.
bilingual.target: 她每周在那里做一次志愿者，帮助孩子们学习阅读。

bilingual.source: She still works there once a week to help kids learn to read.
bilingual.target: 她现在每周在那里工作一次，帮助孩子们学习阅读。

list.abstract: read（英[riːd , red]，美[riːd , red]），英语单词。可做动词或名词用，用作动词时，指读、阅读；用作名词时，指书、读物。英语短语有read aloud，译为大声朗读。例句有“The old man read the script (剧本) before accepting the invitation.”翻译为老人在接受邀请之前看了剧本。 第三人称单数：reads，现在分词：reading，过去式：read，过去分词：read，近义词为absorb、lire等。
read，英语单词，在汉语中有多种译法和解释，一般有朗诵、了解的含义。read同时又是计算机语言函数和命令，用在不同的位置有不同的译法、解释及作用，应视情而定。

yingyinNormal.en: So I went to read English books.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样，我去了牛津阅读英语书籍。

yingyinNormal.en: Before we learned to read and write, we learned to speak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们学会阅读和书写前，我们先学会说话。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean read? Chapter one. Oh, I'm bored out of my mind. Let's go to a movie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说阅读吗？第一章。我已经无聊死了，我们去看电影吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Most people, even kings and queens, couldn't write or read in ancient times.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很久以前，大部分的人，包括国王和皇后，都无法书写或阅读。

yingyinNormal.en: I was able to read when I was 18 months old. Guess that might have been when I became advanced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我十八个月的时候就可以阅读了，我猜我就是从那时候开始"变得"渊博的。

yingyinNormal.en: And go to Paris and Rome and listen to jazz and read and eat good food in nice restaurants and have fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后去巴黎罗马听爵士乐，阅读，在宜人的餐馆吃精美的食物，享受乐趣。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, fine. Then we vote you out. Hold on. Hold on. First, we have to read the minutes from last month's meeting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。那我们要把你罢免。等一等。等等。首先，我们先得阅读上个月的会议记录。

yingyinNormal.en: Later, the participants read a story about a hypothetical person, and were asked to rate their personality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后，受试者阅读一篇故事内容关于一个虚构的人物，他们被要求评价这个人物的个性。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. I thought you had a big meeting. I do, but I left my cellphone here. I need it to read at stoplights so I don't think about stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你今天不是要开重大会议吗？是啊，但我把手机忘在家里了，我需要在红灯时用手机阅读，这样就不会乱想了。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I ask you a question? Sure. When did you first become so advanced? So I became advanced? Well, I mean for instance when did you start to read.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以问你一个问题吗？当然。你从什么时候开始变得这么知识渊博的？所以我是"变得"知识渊博的吗？不，我是说比如你什么时候开始阅读的。

yingyinNormal.en: We read there. I read "Clifford the Big Red Dog."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在那儿看的。我读的是《大红狗克利福德》。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I can't read German.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不懂德语

yingyinNormal.en: You don't know how to read.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不识字。

yingyinNormal.en: You read my video game reviews?
yingyinNormal.zh: 您读过我写的游戏评测？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yeah? What else have you read?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？你还读过哪本？

yingyinNormal.en: I couldn't even be bothered to read.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我连书都懒得读。

yingyinNormal.en: You could always read a bit about it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以看些书了解一下。

yingyinNormal.en: But when I read this, I had to try it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但当我读了这个，我一定要玩玩看。

yingyinNormal.en: Where did you read that? I made it up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这话你在哪看到的？我现编的。

yingyinNormal.en: That bad, huh? Read this woman's tweet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有那么糟啊？念一下这个女生的微博。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可读的；可破译的；清楚的；易读的；容易读的；有趣的
n. 读者群；高级讲师职务
n. 读者；爱读书的人；抄表员；读本；选集；高级讲师；阅读器
n. 阅读；阅读技巧；阐释；读数；宣读

word_family.mean: v. 读；阅读；检查并记录…上的数字；攻读；学习；复制；转移；收听到；听见（无线电发射机里的说话者）的话；理解

examination_example.sentence: And so he <highlight>reads</highlight> — everything from encyclopedias to science fiction novels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他什么都看，从百科全书到科幻小说。

examination_example.sentence: Every person is a really good book to <highlight>read</highlight>, or to have a conversation with!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一个人都是一本真正值得读的好书，或者可以与之交谈的好书！

examination_example.sentence: How we <highlight>read</highlight> a given text also depends to some extent on our particular interest in reading it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们如何阅读给定的文本在某种程度上也取决于我们对阅读它的特殊兴趣。

sense_info_list.en: discover information by reading it in a written or printed source

examination_example.sentence: Why do people <highlight>read</highlight> negative Internet comments and do other things that will obviously be painful?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么人们会看网络负面评论，并且做其他明显会让人痛苦的事情？

sense_info_list.en: to have sth written on it

examination_example.sentence: Visual recognition, <highlight>reads</highlight> the study, is "an automatic psychological process, occurring rapidly and intuitively with little or no apparent conscious deliberation".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究写到，视觉识别是“一种自发的心理过程，迅速而直观地发生，很少或根本没有明显的有意识思考。”

sense_info_list.en: hear and understand someone, especially when communicating by radio
understand or interpret the nature or significance of
inspect and record the figure indicated on a measuring instrument
substitute in a text
study an academic subject at a university
(of a computer) copy, transfer, or interpret data
a book considered in terms of its readability

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 读错；判断错；解释错；误解
adj. 可读的；可破译的；清楚的；易读的；容易读的；有趣的
n. 读者；爱读书的人；抄表员；读本；选集；高级讲师；阅读器

word_family.mean: v. 读；阅读；检查并记录…上的数字；攻读；学习；复制；转移；收听到；听见（无线电发射机里的说话者）的话；理解

sense_info_list.en: say the words that are printed or written

examination_example.sentence: And the most valuable kind of homework for elementary level children was simply assigned free <highlight>reading</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对小学水平的孩子来说，最有价值的家庭作业就是指定自由阅读。

examination_example.sentence: In another study, researchers found that <highlight>reading</highlight> scientific articles containing jargon led people to doubt the actual science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在另一项研究中，研究人员发现，阅读包含行话的科学文章会导致人们怀疑真正的科学。

examination_example.sentence: What do researchers find about people <highlight>reading</highlight> scientific articles containing jargon terms?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们阅读含有术语的科学文章时，研究人员发现了什么？

sense_info_list.en: discover information by reading it in a written or printed source

examination_example.sentence: I've <highlight>read</highlight> about it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我已经知道了一些。

examination_example.sentence: People exposed to jargon when <highlight>reading</highlight> about subjects like autonomous vehicles and surgical robots later said they were less interested in science than others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在读到自动驾驶汽车和手术机器人等主题时接触到行话的人后来表示，他们对科学的兴趣不如其他人。

sense_info_list.en: a book considered in terms of its readability
(of a computer) copy, transfer, or interpret data
inspect and record the figure indicated on a measuring instrument

word_usage.usage:
read表示“读起来”时习惯上用主动语态，作不及物动词，不用于被动结构。
示例：这句子读起来很流畅。
误 The sentence is read smoothly.
正 The sentence reads smoothly.

read表“阅读”时，为及物动词，但泛指“看书”或“读书”时，一般不在read后加book，若表示“看某一本书”，则可说read a book。
示例：(1) 我正在读书。
误 I am reading books.
正 I am reading.
(2) 那小姑娘正在看一本书。
误 The little girl is reading.
正 The little girl is reading a book.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 读错；判断错；解释错；误解
adj. 可读的；可破译的；清楚的；易读的；容易读的；有趣的
n. 读者；爱读书的人；抄表员；读本；选集；高级讲师；阅读器
n. 阅读；阅读技巧；阐释；读数；宣读

word_family.mean: v. 读；阅读；检查并记录…上的数字；攻读；学习；复制；转移；收听到；听见（无线电发射机里的说话者）的话；理解

sense_info_list.en: say the words that are printed or written

examination_example.sentence: My identity had been shaped by years of never <highlight>reading</highlight>, seeing, hearing, or learning about people who had a similar background as me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，我从未阅读、看到、听到或了解过与我背景相似的人，这形成了我的身份。

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>reading</highlight> the Bulletin of Information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过阅读考生手册。

examination_example.sentence: There's plenty I can get to <highlight>read</highlight> and listen to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以读很多书，听很多书。

sense_info_list.en: discover information by reading it in a written or printed source

examination_example.sentence: As you <highlight>read</highlight> this, you are likely aware of what time it is, how old you are, your checking account balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当您阅读本文时，您可能知道现在几点、您的年龄以及您的支票账户余额。

examination_example.sentence: Admissions officers <highlight>read</highlight> every personal statement that arrives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 招生官员阅读每一份寄来的个人陈述。

sense_info_list.en: understand or interpret the nature or significance of

examination_example.sentence: And yes, you <highlight>read</highlight> that right: There is a lunch box museum, right near the Chattahoochee River.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，你没看错：有一个午餐盒博物馆，就在查塔胡奇河附近。

sense_info_list.en: inspect and record the figure indicated on a measuring instrument

examination_example.sentence: They should be able to be <highlight>read</highlight> by a machine at temperatures ranging from 10 degrees Celsius to 50 degrees Celsius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们应该能够在 10 摄氏度到 50 摄氏度的温度范围内被机器读取。

sense_info_list.en: a book considered in terms of its readability

word_usage.usage:
read表“阅读”时，为及物动词，但泛指“看书”或“读书”时，一般不在read后加book，若表示“看某一本书”，则可说read a book。
示例：(1) 我正在读书。
误 I am reading books.
正 I am reading.
(2) 那小姑娘正在看一本书。
误 The little girl is reading.
正 The little girl is reading a book.

read表示“读起来”时习惯上用主动语态，作不及物动词，不用于被动结构。
示例：这句子读起来很流畅。
误 The sentence is read smoothly.
正 The sentence reads smoothly.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 解释; 揣摩; 理解

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大声朗读；高声阅读；大声读出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 读者；爱读书的人；抄表员；读本；选集；高级讲师；阅读器
n. 阅读；阅读技巧；阐释；读数；宣读

word_family.mean: v. 读；阅读；检查并记录…上的数字；攻读；学习；复制；转移；收听到；听见（无线电发射机里的说话者）的话；理解

examination_example.sentence: But if you have to <highlight>read</highlight> a great deal for study, you will appreciate the benefits of being able to <highlight>read</highlight> more quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果你为了学习而必须大量阅读，你会意识到能够快速阅读的好处。

examination_example.sentence: It's time to practice <highlight>reading</highlight> them every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是时候每天练习阅读了。

examination_example.sentence: Whaley says the project is about more than just learning to <highlight>read</highlight> and speak in public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Whaley说，这个项目不仅仅是学习在公共场合朗读和演讲。

sense_info_list.zh: 解释; 揣摩; 理解

examination_example.sentence: I'm not a trained musician, but I've learnt to <highlight>read</highlight> music so I can help Maria in her performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不是一个训练有素的音乐家，但我已经学会了识谱，这样我就可以帮助玛丽亚的表演。

examination_example.sentence: Then he hung a colorful sign on each of the benches that <highlight>read</highlight>: "HAPPY TO CHAT."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他在每条长凳上挂了一块彩色的牌子，上面写着：“很高兴聊天。”

examination_example.sentence: If we substitute a number for each letter, the message "Meet me" would <highlight>read</highlight> "13520135. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们用一个数字来代替每个字母，那么短信“Meet me”（来见我）就会变成“13520135”。

examination_example.sentence: Here she picks her top <highlight>reads</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下面是她最喜欢读的书。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 读者；爱读书的人；抄表员；读本；选集；高级讲师；阅读器
n. 阅读；阅读技巧；阐释；读数；宣读

word_family.mean: v. 读；阅读；检查并记录…上的数字；攻读；学习；复制；转移；收听到；听见（无线电发射机里的说话者）的话；理解

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 大声朗读；高声阅读；大声读出
读和写；读写；阅读和写作
阅读…的文章；读关于…的书；了解到…

examination_example.sentence: Put away your smartphones, and <highlight>read</highlight> for at least 30 minutes, every day!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 收起你的智能手机，每天至少阅读30分钟！

examination_example.sentence: Maybe you like to have a quiet place to <highlight>read</highlight> a book or to think about your day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许你喜欢有一个安静的地方看书或思考你的一天。

examination_example.sentence: She doesn't often <highlight>read</highlight> with her daughter in the evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她不常在晚上和女儿一起读书。

sense_info_list.en: to have something written on it

examination_example.sentence: A headline in The New York Times <highlight>read</highlight>: "Death of the Great Novelist...Will Be Remembered by the People..."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《纽约时报》的标题写道：“伟大小说家之死……将被人们铭记……”

examination_example.sentence: The man sent a bill that <highlight>read</highlight>: Tapping with a hammer—$2.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男人寄来一张账单，上面写着：用锤子敲击——2美元。

examination_example.sentence: The message <highlight>reads</highlight>, Hey, I'm not OK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消息显示：嘿，我不太好。

sense_info_list.en: discover information by reading it in a written or printed source

examination_example.sentence: Change the information you <highlight>read</highlight> into a mind map.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将你读到的信息更改为思维导图。

sense_info_list.en: to take information from a disk

examination_example.sentence: Then computers can <highlight>read</highlight> it directly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后电脑可以直接读取。

word_usage.usage:
read表示“读起来”时习惯上用主动语态，作不及物动词，不用于被动结构。
示例：这句子读起来很流畅。
误 The sentence is read smoothly.
正 The sentence reads smoothly.

read表“阅读”时，为及物动词，但泛指“看书”或“读书”时，一般不在read后加book，若表示“看某一本书”，则可说read a book。
示例：(1) 我正在读书。
误 I am reading books.
正 I am reading.
(2) 那小姑娘正在看一本书。
误 The little girl is reading.
正 The little girl is reading a book.
